content.question: The function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is given by <math alttext="f of x, equals, 4 times x cubed, minus x to the fourth power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>. On what intervals is the graph of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> concave up?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative infinity comma 0, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> and <math alttext="open parenthesis, 2 comma infinity, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, negative infinity comma 3, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>∞</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>
<math alttext="open parenthesis, 0 comma 2, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> only
<math alttext="open parenthesis, 0 comma 3, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> only

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, 0 comma 2, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> only

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
